151.content:
you stir in your sleep and wake to your alarm..."morning already?" you yawn as you stretch and climb gently out of bed you walk past your cracked window,the morning breeze gently caressing you in your short blue nighty,partily exposng your matching panties you giggle a bit at the feeling,looking out your window you can see the window to the house next door...through it a little boy is sleeping in his bed...tyler was a little boy you have had string feelings of atraction toward....your not sure why you preffered children but you could not help it...not that it was THAT bad in your mind,after all its not like you were an adult.

your houses were so close,they were almost touching eachother,if you really wanted too you could climb through the other window...not that you would do something silly like that.

he stirs gently in his sleep snuggled under the blankets...you just could not help but sigh watching his cute little smiling face as he slept...you just wanted to cuddle him in your arms.

after watching for a few moments..
151.title: Christine

info.brief_description: Indulge in that dormant fantasy of yours
info.description:
Everyone has that fantasy that they hide, but here I will and others of the community will try to make it feel as real as possible while you read through this maze of chapters.

There are simple rules that I would like those who add to abide by-
1) Try not to be to gory as some readers may not like it.
2) Don't create stubs= Ex. "How about these?" Try to make a chapter at least 3 sentence long.
3) Spell and grammar check, If I can't read the chapter to the best of my abilities then I will delete it.
3) No POV changes, stick with what character you're viewing

Notes-
-If you add a chapter then message me and I will give you points based on the addition.
-The points received will be based on a system; 1-100 for paragraphs/ 101-150 for detailed paragraphs/ 151-200 for 2 paragraphs/ 201-250 for 2 detailed paragraphs, and so on.
-The point cap is 500, if you surpass expectation listed then I will ignore the cap.


Congrats on getting through the rules now time to indulge yourself.
